name: Batemans Bay Manor - Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2014, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rhonda & Claudio are great hosts and go the extra mile to ensure your stay is memorable. It was great to have a pool to have a light swim and we also enjoyed the jacuzzi. A nice addition not available at many B&B's. We had the Queen double which was a good size and nice to have dressing gowns.
reviews.title: Friendly hosts, Great BBQ, relaxing accommodation

reviews.text: The large BBQ was a great bonus. We knew it was available and with the accommodation slightly out of town we planned to make full use. On the drive into Batesman Bay (on the scenic drive for the south) we saw.a local fisherman selling his previous nights catch and got a good deal on fish & prawns. Rhonda gives you a BBQ box with all that you needs and takes the plates and cutlery away for dishwasher afterwards.
reviews.title: Truly friendly hostess and great service

reviews.text: Great place to go for stopover or a short stay
reviews.title: Fantastic place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This B&B appeared remote and isolated but its warm and friendly hostess and her 2 loveable Border Collies more than made up for its distance. Rhonda touched us with her hospitality by waiting up for our arrival, with her friendly chatter and desire to know more about us and our country and cooking the most delectable breakfast for us. She really lent a personal and very caring touch that we will always remember. Her 2 dogs were absolutely a delight to play with and made us feel like we were back at home with our own dog! The rooms were spacious, very clean and well-furnished and the beds were insanely comfortable. It was a pity that we only stayed at Batemans Bay Manor for a night and we look forward to going there again! :)
reviews.title: Do yourself a favour! David & Carol West OZ

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a wonderful place with exceptional service. Our room was wonderful, very spacious and tastefully decorated. Rhonda and Claudio were wonderful hosts and our breakfast was one of the best we had. We would highly recommend this place, it was by far the best place we stayed in during our holiday in Australia.
reviews.title: What A Welcome

description: Relax and enjoy the privacy of our luxury Bed and Breakfast accommodation. Motel style rooms with additional entertaining areas inside and out for guest use. Continental buffet breakfast each day and/or cooked breakfast made to order. Set on 13 acres just 4 kms from Batemans Bay town centre, restaurants, shops and beaches. Close to some of the best beaches on the south coast of NSW. Ideal for couples and small groups.
